overview: Fang Bin's girlfriend Annie goes to the once shocking haunted village Fengmen Village to do a live adventure and discovers the truth about what is terrifying in the area. The live broadcast stops abruptly, and the whereabouts of his girlfriend is unknown. In order to find his girlfriend Annie, Fang Bin and his roommate set off for Fengmen. On the way, he also meets the website manager Zhou Leifa, his assistant and Annie's two girlfriends who come to look for Annie. The village of Fengmen is deserted, leaving behind many mysterious and spooky objects. As night falls, the group will experience the most terrifying night ......
title: Feng Men Bi Xian
